studentRegistrationStartDate.description: Date when student can register for the interview

totalAchievement.description: Total number of students who submitted the task

minimalAchievement.description: Number of students scoring between 1% and 20% of the maximum points

lowAchievement.description: Number of students scoring between 21% and 50% of the maximum points

moderateAchievement.description: Number of students scoring between 51% and 70% of the maximum points

highAchievement.description: Number of students scoring between 71% and 90% of the maximum points

exceptionalAchievement.description: Number of students scoring between 91% and 99% of the maximum points

perfectScores.description: Number of students achieving a perfect score of 100%
